properties.areaDesc: Burns Harbor to Michigan City IN; Gary to Burns Harbor IN
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 15 at 2:59PM CST until January 16 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Dense Fog
Advisory, which is in effect until 6 PM CST this evening.

* WINDS...to 30 kt from the northwest.

* SIGNIFICANT WAVES...5 to 8 ft.

* OCCASIONAL WAVES...10 ft.

* VISIBILITY...Under one quarter mile at times through this
afternoon.
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that wind speeds of 21 to 33 knots
are expected to produce hazardous wave conditions to small craft.
Inexperienced mariners...especially those operating smaller
vessels should avoid navigating in these conditions.

A Dense Fog Advisory means visibilities will frequently be
reduced to less than one mile. Inexperienced mariners...
especially those operating smaller vessels should avoid
navigating in these conditions.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 PM CST THURSDAY
